description: Ex-interior minister Matteo Salvini loses his immunity and faces trial over holding migrants at sea.
title: Italy Salvini: Senate votes for far-right leader to face trial
title_page: Italy Salvini: Senate votes for far-right leader to face trial - BBC News
maintext: For a man who has built his political success on a hard anti-migrant line, the decision to try him for blocking migrants from Italy feeds the image he presents of himself as defender of the Italian nation. Italy's populist-in-chief will revel in a move that depicts the man of the people as being targeted by the establishment.
